actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation

official_title: A bill to provide that utility payments made by tenants in certain lower income housing projects shall be considered, for purposes of determining the status of such tenants under the AFDC program, to be rental payments.

summary.text: Provides that utility payments made by tenants in lower income housing projects shall be considered rental payments, for purposes of determining eligibility or the amount of benefits under part A (Aid to Families with Dependent Children) of title IV of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide that utility payments made by tenants in certain lower income housing projects shall be considered, for purposes of determining the status of such tenants under the AFDC program, to be rental payments.
